languages.text: Гордость Сантиэля слишком важный мир для династии фон Валанциус, чтобы отказываться от него даже после столь ужасающей катастрофы. Горны в недрах Кьявы Гамма вскоре взревут от переполняющего их жара, и на орбите планеты начнут собирать непостижимые в своем величии плазмадвигатели. Однажды их доставят на заледеневший мир, и Гордость Сантиэля устремится в соседнюю систему, дабы воссиять вновь. А пока выработка прометия на мире будет возобновлена в масштабах, кои представляются возможными.

traits.locale_text: Гордость Сантиэля слишком важный мир для династии фон Валанциус, чтобы отказываться от него даже после столь ужасающей катастрофы. Горны в недрах Кьява Гамма вскоре взревут от переполняющего их жара, и на орбите планеты начнут собирать непостижимые в своем величии плазма-двигатели. Однажды их доставят на заледеневший мир, и Гордость Сантиэля устремится в соседнюю систему, дабы воссиять вновь. А пока выработка прометиума на мире будет возобновлена в масштабах, кои представляются возможными.

languages.text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. One day the engines will be delivered to Santiel's Pride, and the frozen planet will move to the neighbouring system where it can rise again to its former glory. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.
languages.original_text: Гордость Сантиэля слишком важный мир для династии фон Валанциус, чтобы отказываться от него даже после столь ужасающей катастрофы. Горны в недрах Кьявы Гамма вскоре взревут от переполняющего их жара, и на орбите планеты начнут собирать непостижимые в своем величии плазмадвигатели. Однажды их доставят на заледеневший мир, и Гордость Сантиэля устремится в соседнюю систему, дабы воссиять вновь. А пока выработка прометия на мире будет возобновлена в масштабах, кои представляются возможными.

traits.locale_text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat and the magnificent plasma engines will be erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendor. One day they will be delivered to the frozen planet, and Santiel's Pride will move to the next system so it can rise again. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.

The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. languages.text: Malgré la catastrophe qui l'a frappée, la Gloire de Santiel est un monde trop important pour que la dynastie von Valancius ne puisse l'abandonner. Les forges souterraines de Kiava Gamma résonneront bientôt du rugissement des flammes, tandis que naîtront de la fournaise les titanesques moteurs à plasma, d'une splendeur majestueuse et insondable. Ils seront un jour livrés à la Gloire de Santiel, et la planète pourra voguer vers le système voisin, où elle renaîtra de ses cendres. Dans l'intervalle, l'extraction de prométhium continuera à sa surface, dans la limite de ses moyens de production.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. One day the engines will be delivered to Santiel's Pride, and the frozen planet will move to the neighbouring system where it can rise again to its former glory. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.

traits.locale_text: Malgré la catastrophe qui l'a frappée, la Gloire de Santiel est un monde trop important pour que la dynastie von Valancius ne puisse l'abandonner. Les forges souterraines de Kiava Gamma résonneront bientôt du rugissement des flammes, tandis que naîtront de la fournaise les titanesques moteurs à plasma, d'une splendeur majestueuse et insondable. Dans l'intervalle, l'extraction de prométhium continuera à sa surface, dans la limite de ses moyens de production.

languages.text: 对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝而言，哪怕桑提尔之傲遭受了再沉重的灾难，它也依然是个重要的世界，不能轻易抛弃。用不了多久，基亚瓦伽马星深处的锻造炉便会发出炽热的轰鸣声。无数宏伟的等离子引擎将会竖立在这颗行星的轨道之上，绚丽夺目，深不可测。终有一天，这些发动机将会被运往桑提尔之傲，而那颗冰冻的行星也将迁往邻近的星系，在新的家园中重现昔日的辉煌。至于现在，尽管规模不大，但这颗行星表面依然在进行钷素的开采工作。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. One day the engines will be delivered to Santiel's Pride, and the frozen planet will move to the neighbouring system where it can rise again to its former glory. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.

traits.locale_text: 对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝而言，哪怕桑提尔之傲遭受了再沉重的灾难，它也依然是个重要的世界，不能轻易抛弃。用不了多久，基亚瓦伽马星深处的锻造炉便会发出炽热的轰鸣声。无数宏伟的等离子引擎将会竖立在这颗行星的轨道之上，绚丽夺目，深不可测。终有一天，这些发动机将会被运往桑提尔之傲，而那颗冰冻的行星也将迁往邻近的星系，在新的家园中重现昔日的辉煌。至于现在，尽管规模不大，但这颗行星表面依然在进行钷素的开采工作。

languages.text: Trotz der Katastrophe, die die Welt heimgesucht hat: Santiels Stolz ist zu wichtig, um von der Dynastie von Valancius aufgegeben zu werden. Die Schmieden in den Tiefen von Kiava Gamma werden schon bald vor strahlender Hitze brüllen. Atemberaubende Plasmatriebwerke werden im Orbit errichtet werden, gigantisch und von unergründlichem Glanz. Eines Tages werden die Triebwerke nach Santiels Stolz gebracht, und der gefrorene Planet wird ins Nachbarsystem transportiert, wo er seinen früheren Glanz wiedererlangen kann. Bis dahin wird der Promethium-Abbau an der Oberfläche fortgesetzt, zumindest in dem Umfang, in dem das möglich ist.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. One day the engines will be delivered to Santiel's Pride, and the frozen planet will move to the neighbouring system where it can rise again to its former glory. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.

traits.locale_text: Trotz der Katastrophe, die die Welt heimgesucht hat: Santiels Stolz ist zu wichtig, um von der Dynastie von Valancius aufgegeben zu werden. Die Schmieden in den Tiefen von Kiava Gamma werden schon bald vor strahlender Hitze brüllen. Atemberaubende Plasmatriebwerke werden im Orbit errichtet werden, gigantisch und von unergründlichem Glanz. Eines Tages werden die Triebwerke nach Santiels Stolz gebracht, und der gefrorene Planet wird ins Nachbarsystem transportiert, wo er seinen früheren Glanz wiedererlangen kann. Bis dahin wird der Promethium-Abbau an der Oberfläche fortgesetzt, zumindest in dem Umfang, in dem das möglich ist.

languages.text: La dinastía von Valancius considera que Orgullo de Santiel es un mundo demasiado valioso para abandonarlo, aun a pesar de la catástrofe ocasionada. Desde las profundidades, las forjas irradiarán un calor incandescente, mientras en la órbita se erigirán majestuosos motores de plasma, imponentes en su insondable esplendor. Un día, se llevarán motores a Orgullo de Santiel, y este planeta helado se trasladará al sistema cercano, donde podrá recuperar su esplendor. Por el momento, la extracción de prometio en su superficie continuará en la medida de lo posible.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. One day the engines will be delivered to Santiel's Pride, and the frozen planet will move to the neighbouring system where it can rise again to its former glory. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.

languages.text: サンティエル・プライドは大惨事が襲ったものの、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が手放してしまうには、あまりにも惜しい惑星だ。キアヴァ・ガンマの深部にある鍛冶場からは、やがて軌道上に作られた雄大かつ謎を秘めた灼熱の堂々たるプラズマエンジンの咆哮が上げることだろう。いつかエンジンはサンティエル・プライドに届けられて、凍った惑星を隣の星系に移動させ、そこで再びかつての栄光を取り戻すはずだ。しかし、とりあえず現時点では、地表のプロメチウムの採掘は可能な範囲で継続する予定だ。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. One day the engines will be delivered to Santiel's Pride, and the frozen planet will move to the neighbouring system where it can rise again to its former glory. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.

languages.text: Santiel'in Gururu, başına gelen felaket fark etmeksizin von Valancius hanedanlığı tarafından terk edilemeyecek derecede önemli bir dünya. Kiava Gama'nın derinliklerindeki ocaklarda çok yakında akkor ateşler kükremeye başlayacak. Yörüngesinde, göz alabildiğine uzanan muazzam plazma motorları kurulacak. Bir gün bu motorlar, Santiel'in Gururu'na gönderilecek. Sonrasında donmuş gezegen, komşu sisteme taşınarak eski görkemli günlerine yeniden kavuşacak. Şimdilik yüzeyinde elden gelen ölçülerde prometyum çıkarılmaya devam edecek.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride is too important a world to be abandoned by the von Valancius dynasty regardless of the catastrophe that befell it. The forges in the depths of Kiava Gamma will soon roar with incandescent heat, magnificent plasma engines erected in orbit, vast and inscrutable in their splendour. One day the engines will be delivered to Santiel's Pride, and the frozen planet will move to the neighbouring system where it can rise again to its former glory. For now, the extraction of promethium on its surface will continue on whatever scale is deemed possible.
